collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 6 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: select DISTINCT title,c1t.code,c1titleID from tbl_c1_titles as c1t, tbl_client_dfiles_c1 as cd1t where c1t.c1titleID = cd1t.c1tID and cd1t.clientID = 4
select DISTINCT title,c2t.code,c2titleID from tbl_c2_titles as c2t, tbl_client_dfiles_c2 as cd2t where c2t.c2titleID = cd2t.c2tID and cd2t.clientID = 4
select DISTINCT title,c3t.code,c3titleID from tbl_c3_titles as c3t, tbl_client_dfiles_c3 as cd3t where c3t.c3titleID = cd3t.c3tID and cd3t.clientID = 4
